message: {"article":[{"title":"央行凭一人之力<\/font> 难以力<\/font>缆狂澜","articleId":"33789"},{"title":"强力充\"电<\/font>\" 沪指节后首日升势不减","articleId":"11571"},{"title":"【国君通信】盛路通信收购南京恒电<\/font> 军民融合发展","articleId":"10439"},{"title":"军工AND信息安全，电<\/font>科系“太极股份”之资产注入猜测","articleId":"6993"},{"title":"​“金电<\/font>券”三马奔腾，A股向3400进发","articleId":"2723"}],"user":[{"id":"105376577","name":"电","img":"/defavatar/avatar_middle.png","intro":""},{"id":"104771257","name":"★电电","img":"/defavatar/avatar_middle.png","intro":""},{"id":"104112304","name":"㊣电灬电㊣","img":"/defavatar/avatar_middle.png","intro":""},{"id":"105451801","name":"点点电电","img":"/defavatar/avatar_middle.png","intro":""},{"id":"102447487","name":"力","img":"/defavatar/avatar_middle.png","intro":""}],"stock":[{"stockCode":"sz000651","stockName":"格力电器"},{"stockCode":"sz002367","stockName":"康力电梯"},{"stockCode":"01249","stockName":"通力电子"},{"stockCode":"00580","stockName":"赛晶电力电子"}],"question":[{"questionTitle":"吓坏了<\/font>，又跌<\/font>了<\/font>300多点，股灾第二波?今天要不要挂跌<\/font>停价卖出?","questionId":"797"},{"questionTitle":"吓坏了<\/font>！人民币中间价又跌<\/font>了<\/font>1008点！为什么?明天还会跌<\/font>吗?","questionId":"1423"},{"questionTitle":"为什么我看新闻买相关的股票，结果还是跌<\/font>了<\/font>?","questionId":"243"},{"questionTitle":"今天沪指跌<\/font>了<\/font>6.15%,吓傻了<\/font>，明天怎么操作?","questionId":"1701"},{"questionTitle":"股市又下来了<\/font>，跌<\/font>得还很惨，有好多股跌<\/font>停了，市场会二次探底吗?","questionId":"511"}],"topic":[]}
